sn45.42-47:0.2: 5. Abbreviated Texts on Followers of Other Paths
sn45.42-47:0.3: 42–47. Six Discourses on Giving Up Fetters, Etc.
sn45.42-47:1.1: “Mendicants, if wanderers who follow another path were to ask you:
sn45.42-47:1.2: ‘Reverends, what’s the purpose of leading the spiritual life under the ascetic Gotama?’ You should answer them like this:
sn45.42-47:1.3: ‘The purpose of leading the spiritual life under the Buddha is to give up the fetters.’ …
sn45.42-47:1.5: ‘… to completely understand the course of time.’ …
sn45.42-47:1.7: ‘… to realize the fruit of knowledge and freedom.’ …
